text:
@BashirAhmaad @MBuhari We have over 75,000 prisoners inmate,
And @MBuhari released only 2,600 to curb the spread of #covid19 ...
2,600 out 75,000+ 
What happen to the rest ...

I hope this is not a plan to release the rest of the captured Boko Haram members.
